text: Rafael Carvajal Guzmán (1818–1881) was an Ecuadorian politician. He served as Vice President of Ecuador from 1864 to 1865 and acting President from 31 August 1865 to 7 September 1865. He was the Vice President of Gabriel García Moreno. He succeed him after he was assassinated. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1818 births Category:1881 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador
title: Rafael Carvajal
